Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasStrategy<MNStrategy>, PlayerInterface
public class Player extends Object implements PlayerInterface
Player class represents the Player and contains all the information about him: his nickname, the magical school board he received in the beginning of the game, the color for the towers that he will build, his Assistant cards and in particular the last one he played, the amount of coins he owns etc.
